statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_resources;
SELECT id, resource_name, capacity FROM renewable_energy_resources;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT resource_name, capacity, efficiency FROM renewable_energy_resources ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, resource_name, location, capacity, efficiency FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, location, capacity FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE efficiency >= 0.90 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, resource_name FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND efficiency < 0.75;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE efficiency = 0.80 OR efficiency = 0.85 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, efficiency FROM renewable_energy_resources WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND location NOT LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY location, efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPower;
SELECT solar_location FROM SolarPower WHERE solar_capacity > 500;
SELECT solar_capacity, solar_location FROM SolarPower WHERE solar_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WindPower WHERE wind_capacity < 1000;
SELECT wind_location, wind_capacity FROM WindPower WHERE wind_id = 2;
SELECT solar_location, solar_capacity FROM SolarPower WHERE solar_capacity > 100 ORDER BY solar_capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM WindPower WHERE wind_location LIKE 'North%'
SELECT solar_location FROM SolarPower WHERE solar_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_solar_power_plants FROM SolarPower
SELECT SUM(wind_capacity) AS total_wind_capacity FROM WindPower
SELECT id, brand, capacity FROM Solar_Panels;
SELECT * FROM Wind_Turbines WHERE rated_power > 100;
SELECT brand, location FROM Energy_Plants WHERE type='Solar';
SELECT id, rotor_diameter FROM Wind_Turbines ORDER BY rotor_diameter DESC;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Plants WHERE location='California' AND type='Wind' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Solar_Panels ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT brand, capacity FROM Solar_Panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT plant_name, type FROM Energy_Plants WHERE location = 'California' OR location = 'Texas';
SELECT brand, capacity, efficiency FROM Solar_Panels WHERE capacity >= 200 AND efficiency < 0.9 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Wind_Turbines WHERE rated_power > 100 ORDER BY rotor_diameter ASC;
SELECT id, panel_name, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100
SELECT turbine_name, blade_length FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY blade_length DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT production_date, energy_type, energy_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_type='solar'
SELECT consumption_date, consumer_name, energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY panel_name DESC;
SELECT panel_name, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE id < 5;
SELECT SUM(energy_production) AS total_energy_produced FROM EnergyProduction;
SELECT consumption_date, energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumer_name = 'Household' ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT panel_name, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8 AND capacity < 200;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type='routine' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT panel_id, turbine_id, date FROM energy_production WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity >= 250 ORDER BY panel_location;
SELECT turbine_id, turbine_location, turbine_capacity FROM wind_turbines WHERE turbine_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity, date FROM solar_panels JOIN energy_production ON solar_panels.panel_id = energy_production.panel_id;
SELECT SUM(energy_produced) AS total_energy_produced, date FROM energy_production GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_energy_produced DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT panel_location, AVG(panel_capacity) AS avg_capacity FROM solar_panels GROUP BY panel_location HAVING avg_capacity > 200;
